data.text: @ryanlcooper You still need to avoid catching it - long Covid and neuro-psych damage is a population level disaster.

@ryanlcooper this is a question that has bothered me with all of these reports of infections falling: how much of that decrease is just due to decreased testing capacity/availability as well as the constant messaging of “pandemic over, go back to work” encouraging people to ignore symptoms?
@ryanlcooper Also… vulnerable people have died. That’ll help the data
